69250.「オレは パルノ。\n 迷える旅人たちに 運命の一着を授ける\n さすらいの レ:
I'm Parno, a wandering rental outfitter who helps lost travelers find their destiny. But you see. My wardrobe will only be opened when
destiny calls. You'll just have to wait and see.

69252.「レンタル衣装を 借りたいんだな？\n じゃあ どの衣装を借りるか 選んでくれ。:
You want to rent a rental costume? Then choose
which costume you want to rent.

69253.「<%sM_item>を レンタルすると\n こんな感じになるぜ？\n この衣装:
This is what the <%sM_item>
looks like. You want to rent it?
<yesno><close>

69254.「お <%sM_item2>を 持っているのか。\n それがあれば １日の間 無:
Do you have a <%sM_item2>? If you have it, I
can loan you this outfit for free for one day,
do you want to use it now?
<yesno><close>

69255.「<%nM_num>日レンタルだと レンタル料は\n <%nM_gold>ゴール:
If you rent for <%dM_num> days, the rental
fee will be <%dM_gold> gold, is that okay
with you?<yesno><close>

69256.「<%sM_item>の レンタル料は\n １日あたり <%nM_gold>ゴー:
The rental fee for <%sM_item> is <%dM_gold>
gold per day. Can you decide how many days you
want to rent?

69257.「<%sM_item3>を 持っているんだな。\n それを使えば <%sM_it:
You have <%sM_item3>, I see. If you use it, you can borrow that costume free for one day.
Do you want to use your <%sM_item3>, then?

69258.「よし。じゃあ チケットは\n ここで もらっておくぜ。: Okay. I'll get the tickets here.

69259.「それじゃあ またな 旅人よ。心だけは\n いつも クールに はばたかせてくれ！:
See you later, traveler. Let my heart always
be cool and fluttering!

69262.「オレは さすらいのレンタル衣装屋 パルノ。\n 迷える旅人よ。今日は なんの用:
I'm Parno, and this is my wandering Rental
Shop. What can I do for you today, my lost
traveler?
<break>

69265.「<%sM_item>をレンタル中だな。\n 他の衣装を借りるなら 今借りてる衣:
You're renting <%sM_item>. If you rent another outfit, I'll ask you to return the one you're currently renting, but you still want to rent
it?

69266.「レンタル衣装は 借りると元の装備の性能のまま\n 見た目だけを 他では 絶対に:
The rental costume is a dream costume that allows you to change your appearance to something cool that you would never be able to
achieve otherwise, while maintaining the performance of your original equipment. You can take off or put on the rented costume at
any time from the "equipment" screen. Of course, the rental fee is different for each costume. Costumes with a ticket icon can be
exchanged for a costume ticket in the item bag. Costumes with ticket icons can be exchanged for a costume ticket in the item
bag, and once received, can be rented for gold. Costumes without a ticket icon can be rented for free as many times as you want, as
long as you have the ticket in the Costume Ticket Box in the Key Items.

69267.「オーケー！ 商談成立だ！\n レンタルした衣装は 『そうび』画面から\n いつ:
Okay, we've got a deal! You can take off or
put on your rental outfit from the "equipment"
screen at any time!

69827.「<%sM_item>は チケット制の衣装だ。\n ハロウィン衣装券があれば 何:
<%sM_item> is a ticketed costume, you can rent it as many times as you want with a Halloween Costume Ticket, rental period is 9 days. Do
you want to rent this <%sM_item>?

69829.「<%sM_item>は 人気の衣装でな。\n 期間は １日限定。レンタル料は\:
<%sM_item> is a popular costume. The rental
fee is <%dM_gold> gold.
<yesno><close>

69846.「オレは パルノ。\n 迷える旅人たちに 運命の一着を授ける\n さすらいの レ:
I am Parno, a wandering rental outfitter who gives lost travelers their destiny. I only open my wardrobe when fate has decreed it! But
now it seems that time has come! Renting a costume from this rental outfit shop will give you a super cool new look without sacrificing
the performance of your original equipment! Come on, you lost travelers. What do you want today?

72248.「<%sM_item>は 人気の衣装でな。\n 期間は １日限定なんだ。\n<b:
<%sM_item> is a popular costume. It's only
available for one day. You have <%sM_item2>? I
can lend it to you for free if you have it.
<yesno><close>

78831.「<%sM_item>は チケット制の衣装だ。\n ハロウィン衣装券があれば 何:
<%sM_item> is a ticketed costume that can be rented as many times as you want with a Halloween Costume Ticket. The rental period is
9 days, but during the Halloween event, the rental period will be extended! Do you want to rent this <%sM_item>?

83275.「<%sM_item>は チケット制の衣装だ。\n <%sM_item2>で 何:
<%sM_item> is a ticket outfit. <%sM_item2> can be rented as many times as you want. The rental period is 9 days.
However, since there's an event now, this rental will last the entire time! So, do you want to to rent the <%sM_item>?

83281.「<%sM_item>は チケット制の衣装だ。\n <%sM_item2>で 何:
<%sM_item> is a ticket outfit. <%sM_item2> can be rented as many times as you want. The rental period is 9 days.
So, do you want to to rent the <%sM_item>?

87210.「今日から 過去に一度でも入手した衣装は\n 対応したチケットがなくても いつで:
From today on, you can rent costumes you have already acquired anytime without a corresponding ticket. Of course, you can rent
costumes for free if you bring the corresponding ticket, but even if you don't have a ticket, you can rent costumes by paying
rental fee. So, lost travelers, what can I do for you today? What do you want today?

87215.「<%sM_item>は チケット制の衣装だ。\n ミローレ衣装券があれば 何度:
<%sM_item> is a ticketed costume, you can rent it as many times as you want with a Milore Costume Ticket, rental period is 9 days. Do

<%sM_item> is a ticketed outfit, you can rent it as many times as you want with your Sweet Outfit Ticket, rental period is 9 days. Do you
